Nightclub.english: 1. The nightclub is crowded tonight.
Nightclub.italian: Il locale notturno è affollato stasera.
Nightclub.spanish: La discoteca está llena esta noche.
Nightclub.german: Der Nachtclub ist heute Abend voll.

Nightclub.english: 2. The DJ is playing great music.
Nightclub.italian: Il DJ sta suonando della buona musica.
Nightclub.spanish: El DJ está poniendo buena música.
Nightclub.german: Der DJ spielt tolle Musik.

Nightclub.english: 3. Let's dance all night long!
Nightclub.italian: Balliamo tutta la notte!
Nightclub.spanish: ¡Bailamos toda la noche!
Nightclub.german: Lasst uns die ganze Nacht tanzen!

Nightclub.english: 4. I love the vibrant atmosphere of nightclubs.
Nightclub.italian: Amo l'atmosfera vivace dei locali notturni.
Nightclub.spanish: Me encanta la atmósfera vibrante de las discotecas.
Nightclub.german: Ich liebe die lebendige Atmosphäre von Nachtclubs.

Nightclub.english: 5. The nightclub is known for its amazing cocktails.
Nightclub.italian: Il locale notturno è famoso per i suoi cocktail fantastici.
Nightclub.spanish: La discoteca es conocida por sus cócteles increíbles.
Nightclub.german: Der Nachtclub ist bekannt für seine erstaunlichen Cocktails.

Nightclub.english: 6. Are you ready to party at the nightclub?
Nightclub.italian: Sei pronto per divertirti al locale notturno?
Nightclub.spanish: ¿Estás listo para la fiesta en la discoteca?
Nightclub.german: Bist du bereit, in dem Nachtclub zu feiern?

Nightclub.english: 7. The nightclub has a dress code.
Nightclub.italian: Il locale notturno ha un dress code.
Nightclub.spanish: El club tiene un código de vestimenta.
Nightclub.german: Der Nachtclub hat eine Kleiderordnung.

Nightclub.english: 8. Let's meet at the nightclub entrance.
Nightclub.italian: Ci vediamo all'ingresso del locale notturno.
Nightclub.spanish: Quedemos en la entrada de la discoteca.
Nightclub.german: Treffen wir uns am Eingang des Nachtclubs.

Nightclub.english: 9. The nightclub is open until dawn.
Nightclub.italian: Il locale notturno è aperto fino all'alba.
Nightclub.spanish: El club está abierto hasta el amanecer.
Nightclub.german: Der Nachtclub ist bis zum Morgengrauen geöffnet.

Nightclub.english: 10. We danced the night away at the nightclub.
Nightclub.italian: Abbiamo ballato tutta la notte al locale notturno.
Nightclub.spanish: Bailamos toda la noche en la discoteca.
Nightclub.german: Wir haben die ganze Nacht im Nachtclub getanzt.

Nightclub.english: 11. The nightclub has a VIP area.
Nightclub.italian: Il locale notturno ha un'area VIP.
Nightclub.spanish: La discoteca tiene un área VIP.
Nightclub.german: Der Nachtclub hat einen VIP-Bereich.

Nightclub.english: 12. The nightclub offers a variety of music genres.
Nightclub.italian: Il locale notturno offre una varietà di generi musicali.
Nightclub.spanish: La discoteca ofrece una variedad de géneros musicales.
Nightclub.german: Der Nachtclub bietet eine Vielzahl von Musikgenres.

Nightclub.english: 13. The nightclub is a popular spot for tourists.
Nightclub.italian: Il locale notturno è un punto di attrazione per i turisti.
Nightclub.spanish: La discoteca es un lugar popular para los turistas.
Nightclub.german: Der Nachtclub ist ein beliebter Treffpunkt für Touristen.

Nightclub.english: 14. The nightclub has a dance floor and a lounge area.
Nightclub.italian: Il locale notturno ha una pista da ballo e un'area lounge.
Nightclub.spanish: La discoteca tiene una pista de baile y una zona de estar.
Nightclub.german: Der Nachtclub hat eine Tanzfläche und einen Lounge-Bereich.

Nightclub.english: 15. The nightclub is hosting a live music event tonight.
Nightclub.italian: Il locale notturno ospita un evento di musica dal vivo stasera.
Nightclub.spanish: La discoteca está organizando un evento de música en vivo esta noche.
Nightclub.german: Der Nachtclub veranstaltet heute Abend eine Live-Musik-Veranstaltung.

Nightclub.english: 16. The nightclub has a strict age restriction.
Nightclub.italian: Il locale notturno ha un'età minima rigorosa.
Nightclub.spanish: La discoteca tiene una restricción de edad estricta.
Nightclub.german: Der Nachtclub hat eine strenge Altersbeschränkung.

Nightclub.english: 17. The nightclub is known for its vibrant dance performances.
Nightclub.italian: Il locale notturno è famoso per le sue vibranti esibizioni di danza.
Nightclub.spanish: La discoteca es conocida por sus vibrantes actuaciones de baile.
Nightclub.german: Der Nachtclub ist bekannt für seine lebendigen Tanzvorführungen.

Nightclub.english: 18. The nightclub offers bottle service for VIP guests.
Nightclub.italian: Il locale notturno offre il servizio in bottiglia per gli ospiti VIP.
Nightclub.spanish: La discoteca ofrece servicio de botella para los huéspedes VIP.
Nightclub.german: Der Nachtclub bietet Flaschenservice für VIP-Gäste an.

Nightclub.english: 19. The nightclub has a strict no-smoking policy.
Nightclub.italian: Il locale notturno ha una rigorosa politica anti-fumo.
Nightclub.spanish: La discoteca tiene una estricta política de no fumar.
Nightclub.german: Der Nachtclub hat eine strikte Nichtraucherpolitik.

Nightclub.english: 20. Let's have a fun night out at the nightclub!
Nightclub.italian: Passiamo una divertente serata al locale notturno!
Nightclub.spanish: ¡Vamos a pasar una noche divertida en la discoteca!
Nightclub.german: Lasst uns einen spaßigen Abend im Nachtclub verbringen!
